title.narrative: Girls' Education in South Sudan - Programme Costs

description.narrative: This activity (Girls' Education in South Sudan - Programme Costs) is a component of Girls' Education in South Sudan reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £60,077,072. This component benefits South Sudan, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Education facilities and training, Basic life skills for youth and adults. , with the following implementing partners: Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 19-09-2011 and the end date is 30-09-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic life skills for youth and adults

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Education - Social Affairs - Education - advanced technical and managerial training
Education - Social Affairs - Education - teacher training
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2016 Quarter 1
